summary.body: I wondered if anyone knew if there was a Type 57 floorplan online somewhere - I'm sure I remember seeing one. Many thanks, Simon
summary.subject: Type 57 floorplan?

summary.body: A friend of mine has lent me the original brochure for the Barbican Estate and also the Breton House brochure. I think they both date back to the sixties or early seventies. I just wondered whether anyone had the equivalent  for Ben Jonson House, which I would be very interested to see. Or perhaps they are all archived somewhere?
summary.subject: Original Barbican brochures
